description: The industry is all about Chat bots, Speech synthesis and recognition, Natural Language Processing... In this session, we'll detail how to build advanced interactions in Javascript with Cisco Spark and Tropo. We'll take the example of the Interactive Voice Responder that was setup for the CodeMotion Milan Conference this year. Last part of the session will be interactive so that we can share our various experiences with frameworks and industry gaps.
title: Build advanced Voice Assistants and ChatBots
